Workflow Instance.name: Example
Workflow Instance.description: This is a sample workflow. The driver application is writer, and the downstream analysis application is reader.

Workflow Component.name: writer_profiles
Workflow Component.description: This is a component of the workflow. This names the directory of profiles to be parsed for one execution of one application.

Workflow Component.name: reader_profiles
Workflow Component.description: This is a component of the workflow. This names the directory of profiles to be parsed for one execution of one application.

Workflow Component-input.name: creat_out.dat
Workflow Component-input.description: This is the file input to the reader application.

Workflow Component-input.name: fopen_out.dat
Workflow Component-input.description: This is the file input to the reader application.

Workflow Component-output.name: creat_out.dat
Workflow Component-output.desctiption: This is the output from the main driver application.

Workflow Component-output.name: fopen_out.dat
Workflow Component-output.desctiption: This is the output from the main driver application.

Workflow Component-output.name: open_out.dat
Workflow Component-output.desctiption: This is the output from the main driver application.

Metric.description: This is a metric used to measure the applications.

Location.description: This is where the application was executed.
